content: sweet paprika designs cranberry biscotti designed by elizabeth sullivan skill level skill level pattern and photos © sweet paprika designs 2008 www sweetpaprikadesigns com cranberry biscotti skill level heel flap intermediate rearrange sts by dividing the 36 sts on 2nd dpn onto 2 needles and leave for instep knit the 18 sts from 1st dpn onto the end of size the 3rd dpn women s medium work back and forth on the 36 heel sts as follows finished measurements row 1 ws sl 1 purl to end of row turn circumference 7 row 2 rs * sl 1 k1 repeat from * to end of row turn repeat row 1 and 2 sixteen more times foot length 9 turn heel yarn row 1 ws sl 1 p20 p2tog p1 turn fingering weight yarn 230 yds colour a 115 yds each in row 2 rs sl 1 k7 ssk k1 turn colours b and c row 3 sl 1 p8 p2tog p1 turn row 4 sl 1 k9 ssk k1 turn shown in sweet paprika messa di voce 100% superwash merino row 5 sl 1 p10 p2tog p1 turn wool 100g/460 yds 1 skein each canneberge a café au lait row 6 sl 1 k11 ssk k1 turn b and hot cocoa c continue to decrease in the same manner working 1 st more needles before decrease each row until all sts have been worked and 22 sts size 1 2 25mm set of 4 double-pointed needles remain ending with a rs row do not turn or size needed to obtain gauge gusset notions slip the 36 instep sts onto one needle with rs facing and using yarn needle 1st dpn with the 22 heel sts pick up and knit 17 sts along side of heel with 2nd dpn knit across the 36 instep sts with 3rd dpn gauge pick up and knit 17 sts along other side of heel then knit 11 sts 20 sts and 32 rnds = 2 in woven stripe pattern worked in the from 1st dpn round there are 92 sts in the round 28 sts on 1st dpn 36 sts on 2nd woven stripe pattern multiple of 2 sts dpn and 28 sts on 3rd dpn and the beg of round is now at centre note all sts should be slipped purlwise throughout pattern of heel rnds 1 2 with a knit round 3 with b * k1 slip 1 wyif repeat from * to end note when shaping the gusset it is important to keep the instep sts round 4 with b knit on the 2nd dpn in the established colour pattern this means you will round 5 with a * slip 1 wyif k1 repeat from * to end sometimes have to knit 2 sts in a row on the 1st and 3rd dpns rnds 6 8 with a knit round 9 with b * k1 slip 1 wyif repeat from * to end starting with round 2 of woven stripe pattern shape
